meanings.definition: Having the same number of moles of solute per liter of solution.
meanings.sent1: The equimolal solution contained an equal amount of solute in each liter.
meanings.sent2: Scientists compared the equimolal solutions to determine their properties.
meanings.sent3: The equimolal mix-up in the lab led to some interesting reactions.
meanings.sent4: Her equimolal approach to problem-solving ensured balanced outcomes.
meanings.sent5: The equimolal solution sparkled like a perfectly measured potion.
